articles.title: Bhaiyya Ji Movie Review: A formulaic tale of revenge and redemption - TOI Etimes
articles.description: Manoj Bajpayee shines throughout the film, effortlessly transitioning between intense emotional moments and action-packed sequences. He even brings a touch of humour to some scenes, showcasing his acting versatility.
